## Question 2

```{r}
Grades |>
  summarise(Minimum=min(Exam, na.rm=TRUE),
          Maximum=max(Exam, na.rm=TRUE),
          Med=median(Exam, na.rm=TRUE),
          Mean=mean(Exam, na.rm=TRUE)) |>
  knitr::kable()
```
